








* spawn actor
{{{class = "brush:c++"
	// in .h
	UPROPERTY(EditDefaultsOnly, Category = Projectile)
	TSubclassOf<class AActor> ActorSubClass;
	
	// in .cpp
	UWorld* World = GetWorld();
	if (World) {
		FActorSpawnParameters SpawnParameters;
		// now set spawn params
		// e.g.
		//SpawnParameters.Owner = this;
		//SpawnParameters.Instigator = Instigator;
		AActor* MyActor = World->SpawnActor<AActor>(ActorSubClass, LocationVector, RatationVector, SpawnParameters);
	}
}}}
